outputs.output_descr:
1. strenghthened capaicy of coordination, institution and policy framework on DDT phase out and Environmental sound management of POPs stockpiles and wastes
2. Implemented Integrated Pest Management (IPM) demonstration  totally in 3,000 ha at three counties in three years and elimiated the dicofol use in the pilot areas
3. Closure of non-closed prodution lines on dicofol in China
4. Optimization of existing closed-system dicofol production
5. Development of a national replication program on IPM

project_descr: Improve of DDT-based production of Dicofol and Introduction of Alternative Technologies including Integrated Pest Management(IPM) for Leaf Mite Control in China
project_title: Improvement of DDT usage for Dicofol production
